natural solution: Let $\log_{3}{\frac{1}{9}}=b$. Then $\frac{1}{9}=3^b$. Express $\frac{1}{9}$ as a power of $3$: $\frac{1}{9}=\frac{1}{3^2}=3^{-2}$.

 Let $\log_{3}{\frac{1}{9}}=b$. Then $\frac{1}{9}=3^b$. Express $\frac{1}{9}$ as a power of $3$: $\frac{1}{9}=\frac{1}{3^2}=3^{-2}$.

 *)

 *)
